mapper.insert: insert into key_word (id, master_id, group_space, group_final, type_space, type_final, inner_space, inner_final, upper_key, lower_key, modify_attack, delete_attack, query_attack, count_key) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{masterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupFinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeFinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{innerSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{innerFinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upperKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lowerKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyAttack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteAttack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{queryAttack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, master_id, group_space, group_final, type_space, type_final, inner_space, inner_final, upper_key, lower_key, modify_attack, delete_attack, query_attack, count_key from key_word where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, master_id, group_space, group_final, type_space, type_final, inner_space, inner_final, upper_key, lower_key, modify_attack, delete_attack, query_attack, count_key from key_word where master_id = #{masterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, master_id, group_space, group_final, type_space, type_final, inner_space, inner_final, upper_key, lower_key, modify_attack, delete_attack, query_attack, count_key from key_word
